Memorial page for Master O.B.E. Capt. John Henry Reardon “Harry” Smith (1884-20 Mar 1943), citing Tower Hill Memorial, London Borough of Tower Hamlets, Greater London, England (plot: - SS "Fort Mumford" (P.50)); Maintained by AenneLa (contributor 48548982).

std_narrative.citation:
John was mentioned on a memorial in Tower Hill Memorial, London Borough of Tower Hamlets, Greater London, England with a death date of 20 March 1943. '''Memorial''': Find a Grave (has image)
